1.title: Llama Drama
1.plot: Josh and Brent struggle with still living apart as Brent runs the business in the village and Josh earns a paycheck in the city. Plus resident diva llama Polka Spot no longer wants to be fenced in and her constant escapes are becoming a big problem.

2.title: Black Sheep of the Family
2.plot: Josh tries to convince Brent to take a vacation; instead Brent plans a roadtrip to adopt Black Welsh sheep. And Josh worries their relationship has caused Brent to become estranged from his family when he refuses to visit his nearby grandparents.

3.title: A Martha Makeover
3.plot: A visit to Martha Stewart's Bedford estate inspires Brent to make some much-needed improvements to the Beekman farm. Josh is desperate to have a work-free weekend, but Brent decides to host a barn raising and invites the whole town.

4.title: Food & Whine
4.plot: Josh receives unexpected news that has the potential to keep him away from the farm more than ever before. But when Food & Wine magazine arrives for an elaborate photo shoot the boys must focus instead on perfecting the farm and their outfits.

5.title: Store Wars
5.plot: It's Vogue's Fashion Night Out in New York City, Brent arranges a product launch at swanky Henri Bendel's, while Josh has a book signing and cooking demo at Bloomingdales. The boys decide to compete to see who can throw the most successful event.

6.title: Beekmanpalooza Redux
6.plot: With last year's modest success Brent is hard at work prepping for the 2nd Annual Harvest Festival. Brent and Josh make a pact not to argue, but as 5,000 visitors descend on the tiny village the festival becomes more than anyone could have imagined.

7.title: Recipe for Disaster
7.plot: Brent reluctantly gives up control of the first ever Beekman cookbook to Josh and allows Maria to take on new responsibilities in the store. But when things don't go according to plan, Brent begins to regret ever giving up control in the first place.

8.title: Beek-Men Boys
8.plot: Josh's parents, Jackie & Dave, arrive for a weeklong visit at Beekman. Josh asks his mom to join him in Manhattan, in hopes that Brent's week alone with Dave will let him experience having a dad for the first time in a long time.

9.title: Blaak Friday
9.plot: With the success of the Harvest Festival and desperate to reach their million dollar goal, Brent organizes a Victorian Festival hoping it will be the Beekman's answer to Black Friday and drive traffic into the village during the typically slow winter.

10.title: Paging Dr. Brent
10.plot: Brent is offered the opportunity to work as a Doctor in Sharon Springs. Josh is thrilled at the prospect but Brent is reluctant to take any time away from the business, even though it would mean Josh could move to the farm full time.

1.title: When Pigs Fly
1.plot: Cosmopolitan couple Josh and Brent decide to make a drastic change - purchase a farm in upstate New York and launch their own organic lifestyle brand. Can their entrepreneurial venture succeed without sacrificing their relationship?

2.title: Beekmanpalooza
2.plot: In order to try and stir up business, Brent plans a Harvest Weekend. The 3-day event includes a garden party on the Beekman property, a harvest festival in the village and a feast at the American Hotel.

3.title: Unhappy Birthday
3.plot: Josh heads home to the Beekman from NYC looking forward to his 40th birthday weekend on the farm. But because Brent has agreed to host the first-ever wedding at the Beekman, Josh's birthday is put on the back burner.

4.title: Suds & Studs
4.plot: It's breeding season at Beekman Farm and the action in the barn is like nothing Brent and Josh have experienced before. Plus, Brent finds himself overwhelmed with wrapping and packaging 14,000 bars of soap for a huge order.

5.title: Bringing Home the Bacon
5.plot: Brent gets an invitation from Martha Stewart to sample the Beekman cheese at one of her events in the city. Later back at the farm, Josh & Brent face an emotional decision.

6.title: The Haunting of Beekman Farm
6.plot: Josh and Brent take a trip together into the city for a black tie event with Martha Stewart. Later, Brent decides to hire ghost hunters to investigate their 200-year-old estate.

7.title: Turkey a la Queens
7.plot: It's Thanksgiving at Beekman Farm, and Brent and Josh's parents are not only arriving for a visit, but they'll be meeting one another for the first time.

8.title: Three Men and a Baby Goat
8.plot: It's winter at the Beekman, and Farmer John leaves Brent and Josh in charge of the herd of very pregnant goats while he heads to the hospital for hip surgery.

9.title: Le Grand Fromage
9.plot: Looking for a new way to expand their cheese business, Brent has enlisted Josh's cooking skills to land them a spot on the menu of top chef Jean-Georges' new restaurant, ABC Kitchen. Farmer John is busy with more baby goats than he can name.

10.title: Trouble in Store
10.plot: VOD Premiere! Brent decides to open the first Beekman 1802 retail space on Main Street. A grand opening approaching and the space not even close to ready, Brent and Josh are faced with the harsh reality of having to spend their 10-year anniversary apart.

11.title: The Fabulous Beekman Boys Holiday Special
11.plot: Brent and Josh welcome viewers into their home to share behind the scenes moments, never before seen footage, their top five scenes from season one and a sneak peak of the upcoming season.

imdb.plot outline: The Fabulous Beekman Boys documents the adventure of a lifetime, as Brent and Josh try to make their entrepreneurial venture a success without sacrificing their personal relationship. The farm is home to a menagerie that helps produce everything from egg white soap to cheese, but with Josh still living in the city to earn a paycheck and Brent living full time at the farm dealing with the day to day tasks, the couple have created a recipe for conflict. They try to make the most of their weekends together on the farm now that their getaway has become their latest project, but there's always more work: be it a harvest weekend, book signing or launching a new flavor of cheese.
imdb.title: The Fabulous Beekman Boys
plot: _The Fabulous Beekman Boys_ (qv) documents the adventure of a lifetime, as Brent and Josh try to make their entrepreneurial venture a success without sacrificing their personal relationship. The farm is home to a menagerie that helps produce everything from egg white soap to cheese, but with Josh still living in the city to earn a paycheck and Brent living full time at the farm dealing with the day to day tasks, the couple have created a recipe for conflict. They try to make the most of their weekends together on the farm now that their getaway has become their latest project, but there's always more work: be it a harvest weekend, book signing or launching a new flavor of cheese.
